channel.title: TLM - The Love Machine by Sean & Saevion (RSC)
channel.description:
Does anyone still have an old copy of this awsome bot? i would love to update it to 204 for public and it will remain open source.
*Update*
i lost this since someone has uploaded this awsome bot for me a some time ago, does anyone else still have this on hes computer to reupload it for me so i could give another go at making this bot work for this mudclient and ppl can see how good it really is compared to whats been around, thanks.

item.title: TLM - The Love Machine by Sean & Saevion (RSC)
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

Can’t remember, most probably. I can’t find anything in my emails. Must of been on i.r.ownagesbot@gmail.com, of which some stupid cunt stole off me after sending me one of them prorat style apps. I trust people too much…

Read full topic
item.source: TLM - The Love Machine by Sean & Saevion (RSC)

item.title: TLM - The Love Machine by Sean & Saevion (RSC)
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:24, topic:41273”][quote author=vortex link=topic=57778.msg2239514#msg2239514 date=1211595895]
Anyone got SlaveIT btw? Just wondering if it could be deobbed, even partly.
[/quote]

Yes, but not on this computer. If I remember correctly, it’s pretty heavily obfuscated. Of course, we (or at least I) have better tools now than last time I looked at it. I’ll try to remember to grab it next time I’m at that computer. RLN might have the source, he seems to have a lot of them.[/quote]He told me it wasn’t that badly obfuscated, but if I remember correctly… I remember what you remember, lol.

[quote=“ownagesbot, post:30, topic:41273”]In relation to Bruncle. The last I heard was, RSC went downhill so he setup a community to write a game, I think regex might have been apart of it. Anyway I was involved, the game never really hit off so I kind of disappeared out of the community, never seen him since. I’ll look through my emails and see if I can find the old forum and see if it’s still up and running![/quote] I remember, that failed pretty bad. And it was when RSCN went downhill wasn’t it?

Read full topic
item.source: TLM - The Love Machine by Sean & Saevion (RSC)

item.title: TLM - The Love Machine by Sean & Saevion (RSC)
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

In relation to Bruncle. The last I heard was, RSC went downhill so he setup a community to write a game, I think regex might have been apart of it. Anyway I was involved, the game never really hit off so I kind of disappeared out of the community, never seen him since. I’ll look through my emails and see if I can find the old forum and see if it’s still up and running!

Read full topic

item.title: TLM - The Love Machine by Sean & Saevion (RSC)
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

Here’s the only SlaveIT-related stuff I could find.

SlaveC.zip - http://www.mediafire.com/?mtbkl3evyey
SlaveIT199c.zip - http://www.mediafire.com/?jgqjmebdwio

Never used it myself, so I don’t know what the difference is, if there even is one, or what anything means.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:25, topic:41273”][quote author=Krichevskoy link=topic=57778.msg2240111#msg2240111 date=1211629119]

Anyone got SlaveIT btw? Just wondering if it could be deobbed, even partly.

Yes, but not on this computer. If I remember correctly, it’s pretty heavily obfuscated. Of course, we (or at least I) have better tools now than last time I looked at it. I’ll try to remember to grab it next time I’m at that computer. RLN might have the source, he seems to have a lot of them.
[/quote]You, or Mopar, should upload your stuff for download by everyone.[/quote]

Quoted for truth!

*And bunch of other people

item.description:
@Xanatos wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:19, topic:41273”][quote author=Xanatos link=topic=57778.msg2030180#msg2030180 date=1202049071]

Somebody flame this guy then ban him.

why dont you flame me for the reason i should be flamed for in your eyes and stop making useless posts
[/quote]
you ask for something, you get it, then you never collect it, then you ask for it again. who is going to repost something which you may never come back to look for again?

BAsh is right,[/quote]

i did come back and ive put alot of time in it wich was like 2 years ago, now i feel more experienced and want to give this another go. btw if you read all posts then you wouldnt have posted the same msg.

item.description:
@Ferty wrote:

[quote=“Kmb, post:4, topic:41273”]Offtopic, but I beat Krichevskoy up with the amount of archived rsc/rs2 shit on computer:
about 70k files in 5k folders despite the facts that my hdd crashed in summer 2004 + I deleted everything I had after the rsc massban late 2004.

Yeah, I’m cool like that :P[/quote]
Haha i wonder if any of my old sbot scripts are in there

I did have most of my stuff saved but a power surge took care of that unfortunatley

item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“KryptoN_, post:12, topic:41273”]Wow, is that like the original, Uriko?

Mmm, here’s the link I meant to paste - http://doofusbutler.tripod.com/TLMd0_2.zip

Couple of scripts in there.[/quote]
Uhm, yeh I think so.

Kabraxis:

Its nice to see people still have this saved, I lost all my info twice… thanks

Same. That’s why I love hosting. I keep all my stuff uploaded there generally.
